forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
